children.name: AnimatedSprite
children.brief: An AnimatedSprite is a simple way to display an animation depicted by a list of textures.

children.name: stop
children.brief: Stops the AnimatedSprite.

children.name: play
children.brief: Plays the AnimatedSprite.

children.name: gotoAndStop
children.brief: Stops the AnimatedSprite and goes to a specific frame.

children.name: gotoAndPlay
children.brief: Goes to a specific frame and begins playing the AnimatedSprite.

children.name: update
children.brief: Updates the object transform for rendering.

children.name: updateTexture
children.brief: Updates the displayed texture to match the current frame index.

children.brief: Stops the AnimatedSprite and destroys it.

children.brief: true if the instance is currently connected to PIXI.Ticker.shared to auto update animation time.

children.name: animationSpeed
children.brief: The speed that the AnimatedSprite will play at. Higher is faster, lower is slower.

children.name: loop
children.brief: Whether or not the animate sprite repeats after playing.

children.name: updateAnchor
children.brief: Update anchor to [Texture's defaultAnchor]{@link PIXI.Texture#defaultAnchor} when frame changes.

children.brief: Function to call when an AnimatedSprite finishes playing.

children.name: onFrameChange
children.brief: Function to call when an AnimatedSprite changes which texture is being rendered.

children.name: onLoop
children.brief: Function to call when loop is true, and an AnimatedSprite is played and loops around to start again.
